verbose_text: Indeed, in Arabidopsis only the targets of the RdDM located in heterochromatic regions present also high levels of H3K9me2, whereas targets located in euchromatin are often associated with active histone epigenetic marks, such as histone H3 acetylation and H3K4me3, and lack H3K9me2, and it has been proposed that their silencing could be more easily reverted XREF_BIBR.
